query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_reviews,
  SUM(CASE WHEN response IS NULL OR response = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_reviews,
  SUM(CASE WHEN response IS NOT NULL AND response != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as responded_reviews
FROM guest_reviews;
